summary: Within the urban gloom of Taipei, four youths face alienation, loneliness, and moments of existential crisis amidst a series of minor crimes.
cast: Chao-jung Chen|Chang-Bin Jen|Kang-sheng Lee|Yi-Ching Lu|Tien Miao|Yu-Wen Wang
keywords: telephone call|taipei taiwan|telephone booth|pay phone|cigarette smoking
title: Qing shao nian nuo zha
